query.sql: select begin_time,metric_name,value value from GV$SYSMETRIC_HISTORY where metric_name like 'Total PGA Allocated' order by begin_time
select begin_time,metric_name MT,value from GV$SYSMETRIC_HISTORY where metric_name like '%CPU Ut%' order by begin_time
select begin_time,metric_name,value from gv$SYSMETRIC_HISTORY where metric_name = 'Buffer Cache Hit Ratio' and begin_time > sysdate-1/24 order by begin_time desc
select * from dba_hist_database_instance order by startup_time desc

select oracle_username || ' (' || s.osuser || ')' username , s.sid || ',' || s.serial# sess_id , owner || '.' || object_name object , object_type , decode( l.block , 0, 'Not Blocking' , 1, 'Blocking' , 2, 'Global') status , decode(v.locked_mode , 0, 'None' , 1, 'Null' , 2, 'Row-S (SS)' , 3, 'Row-X (SX)' , 4, 'Share' , 5, 'S/Row-X (SSX)' , 6, 'Exclusive', TO_CHAR(lmode)) mode_held from v$locked_object v , dba_objects d , v$lock l , v$session s where v.object_id = d.object_id and v.object_id = l.id1 and V.SESSION_ID = S.sid order by oracle_username , session_id

SELECT r.NAME "RB Segment Name", dba_seg.size_mb, DECODE(TRUNC(SYSDATE - LOGON_TIME), 0, NULL, TRUNC(SYSDATE - LOGON_TIME) || ' Days' || ' + ') || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRUNC(MOD(SYSDATE-LOGON_TIME,1) * 86400), 'SSSSS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') LOGON, v$session.SID, v$session.SERIAL#, p.SPID, v$session.process, v$session.USERNAME, v$session.STATUS, v$session.OSUSER, v$session.MACHINE, v$session.PROGRAM, v$session.module, action FROM v$lock l, v$process p, v$rollname r, v$session, (SELECT segment_name, ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024),2) size_mb FROM dba_segments WHERE segment_type = 'TYPE2 UNDO' ORDER BY bytes DESC ) dba_seg WHERE l.SID = p.pid(+) AND v$session.SID = l.SID AND TRUNC (l.id1(+)/65536)=r.usn AND l.TYPE(+) = 'TX' AND l.lmode(+) = 6 AND r.NAME = dba_seg.segment_name --AND v$session.username = 'SYSTEM' --AND status = 'INACTIVE' ORDER BY size_mb DESC
SELECT snap_id start1, begin_interval_time, end_interval_time FROM dba_hist_snapshot ORDER BY 1 desc
SELECT snap_id stop1, begin_interval_time, end_interval_time, :START1 carry FROM dba_hist_snapshot WHERE snap_id > :START1 ORDER BY 1 desc
SELECT OUTPUT FROM TABLE(DBMS_WORKLOAD_REPOSITORY.AWR_REPORT_TEXT((SELECT DBID FROM V$DATABASE), (SELECT instance_number FROM v$instance),:CARRY, :STOP1))

SELECT b.name, b.value_string, sq.sql_text FROM v$sql_bind_capture b, v$sql sq, v$session s WHERE sq.sql_id = b.sql_id AND sq.address = b.address AND sq.child_address = b.child_address AND sq.parsing_user_id = s.user# AND s.username = :USER --and sql_text like 'SELECT%' order by SQ.SQL_ID, SQ.ADDRESS, SQ.CHILD_ADDRESS, B.POSITION

select username ,command_name ,sum(executions) executions ,sum(parse_calls) parse_calls from v$sql vs join v$sqlcommand vsc using (command_type) join dba_users du on vs.parsing_user_id = du.user_id where command_name in ('INSERT', 'SELECT', 'UPDATE', 'DELETE') group by username, command_name order by username, command_name

select status,duration,sql_id,session_id,session_serial,inst_count||'|'||dop instance_dop, round(cpu_time/1000000,2) cpu_time,round(user_io_wait_time/1000000,2) io_time, start_time, decode(status,'DONE (ALL ROWS)',end_time,null) end_time, sql_fulltext from (SELECT sql_id , sql_exec_id , TO_CHAR(sql_exec_start, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') start_time , sql_exec_start , NVL(refresh_count,0) , NVL(plan_loaded,0) , status , sql_fulltext , TO_CHAR(last_refresh, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') end_time , last_refresh , EXTRACT(DAY FROM (last_refresh - sql_exec_start) DAY TO SECOND ) *24*60*60 + EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (last_refresh - sql_exec_start) DAY TO SECOND ) *60*60 + EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM (last_refresh - sql_exec_start) DAY TO SECOND )*60 + EXTRACT(SECOND FROM (last_refresh - sql_exec_start) DAY TO SECOND ) duration, elapsed_time , cpu_time , java_exec_time , plsql_exec_time , user_io_wait_time , concurrency_wait_time , cluster_wait_time , application_wait_time , other_wait_time , buffer_gets , disk_reads , direct_writes , fetches , NVL(dop,0) dop , inst_count , (disk_reads+direct_writes) io_count , session_id , session_serial , plan_hash_value , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24.MI.SS') FROM (SELECT mo5.* FROM (SELECT mo4.sql_id sql_id , mo4.sql_exec_start sql_exec_start, mo4.sql_exec_id sql_exec_id , (SELECT sq.sql_text FROM v$sql sq WHERE sq.sql_id = mo4.sql_id AND rownum = 1 ) sql_fulltext , mo4.sql_plan_hash_value plan_hash_value, (SELECT 1 FROM v$sql_plan sqp WHERE sqp.sql_id = mo4.sql_id AND sqp.plan_hash_value = mo4.sql_plan_hash_value AND rownum = 1 ) plan_loaded , MAX(mo4.status) status, MAX( CASE WHEN mo4.px_qcsid IS NULL THEN mo4.sid ELSE NULL END) session_id, MAX( CASE WHEN mo4.px_qcsid IS NULL THEN mo4.session_serial# ELSE NULL END) session_serial , SUM(mo4.refresh_count) refresh_count , MAX(mo4.first_refresh_time) first_refresh, MAX(mo4.last_refresh_time) last_refresh , COUNT(DISTINCT mo4.inst_id) inst_count , MAX( CASE WHEN mo4.px_server_group = 1 AND mo4.px_server_set = 1 THEN mo4.px_server# ELSE NULL END) dop , SUM(mo4.fixed_elapsed_time) elapsed_time , SUM(mo4.cpu_time) cpu_time , SUM(mo4.fetches) fetches , SUM(mo4.buffer_gets) buffer_gets , SUM(mo4.disk_reads) disk_reads , SUM(mo4.direct_writes) direct_writes , SUM(mo4.application_wait_time) application_wait_time, SUM(mo4.concurrency_wait_time) concurrency_wait_time, SUM(mo4.cluster_wait_time) cluster_wait_time , SUM(mo4.user_io_wait_time) user_io_wait_time , SUM(mo4.plsql_exec_time) plsql_exec_time , SUM(mo4.java_exec_time) java_exec_time , SUM(mo4.other_wait_time) other_wait_time FROM (SELECT mo1.*, CASE WHEN (NVL(mo1.cpu_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.application_wait_time,0)+ NVL(mo1.concurrency_wait_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.cluster_wait_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.user_io_wait_time, 0)) > NVL(mo1.elapsed_time, 0) THEN (NVL(mo1.cpu_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.application_wait_time,0)+ NVL(mo1.concurrency_wait_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.cluster_wait_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.user_io_wait_time, 0)) ELSE mo1.elapsed_time END fixed_elapsed_time, CASE WHEN (NVL(mo1.cpu_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.application_wait_time,0)+ NVL(mo1.concurrency_wait_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.cluster_wait_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.user_io_wait_time, 0)) > NVL(mo1.elapsed_time, 0) THEN 0 ELSE mo1.elapsed_time - (NVL(mo1.cpu_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.application_wait_time,0)+ NVL(mo1.concurrency_wait_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.cluster_wait_time, 0)+ NVL(mo1.user_io_wait_time, 0)) END other_wait_time FROM (SELECT * FROM gv$sql_monitor mo0 WHERE mo0.INST_ID = userenv('INSTANCE') OR PX_QCINST_ID IS NOT NULL ) mo1 , (SELECT DISTINCT mo2.sql_id, mo2.sql_exec_start , mo2.sql_exec_id FROM v$sql_monitor mo2 WHERE mo2.px_qcsid IS NULL --AND mo2.sql_id = NVL(:SQL_ID, mo2.sql_id) --AND mo2.sid = NVL(:SID, mo2.sid) --AND mo2.session_serial# = NVL(:SERIAL, mo2.session_serial#) ) mo3 WHERE mo1.sql_id = mo3.sql_id AND mo1.sql_exec_start = mo3.sql_exec_start AND mo1.sql_exec_id = mo3.sql_exec_id ) mo4 GROUP BY mo4.sql_id , mo4.sql_exec_start, mo4.sql_exec_id , mo4.sql_plan_hash_value ORDER BY last_refresh DESC, mo4.sql_id ) mo5 WHERE mo5.sql_fulltext IS NOT NULL )) order by status desc

WITH sample_times AS ( select * from dual ), sq AS ( SELECT -- to_char(ash.sample_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') sample_time count(*) samples , ash.sql_id , ash.sql_child_number , ash.sql_plan_hash_value , ash.sql_plan_line_id , ash.sql_plan_operation , ash.sql_plan_options , ash.session_state , ash.event , AVG(ash.p3) avg_p3 FROM v$active_session_history ash WHERE 1=1 --AND ash.session_id = 8 AND ash.session_serial# = 35019 --AND sample_time > SYSDATE-1/24/12 AND ash.sql_id LIKE :SQL_ID --AND ash.sql_child_number LIKE '%&2%' GROUP BY --to_char(ash.sample_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') ash.sql_id , ash.sql_child_number , ash.sql_plan_hash_value , ash.sql_plan_line_id , ash.sql_plan_operation , ash.sql_plan_options , ash.session_state , ash.event ) SELECT plan.sql_id asqlmon_sql_id , plan.child_number asqlmon_sql_child -- , plan.plan_hash_value asqlmon_plan_hash_value , sq.samples seconds , LPAD(TO_CHAR(ROUND(RATIO_TO_REPORT(sq.samples) OVER (PARTITION BY sq.sql_id, sq.sql_plan_hash_value) * 100, 1), 999.9)||' %',8) pct_child , '|'||RPAD( NVL( LPAD('#', ROUND(RATIO_TO_REPORT(sq.samples) OVER (PARTITION BY sq.sql_id, sq.sql_plan_hash_value) * 10), '#'), ' '), 10,' ')||'|' pct_child_vis --, sq.sample_time asqlmon_sample_time --, LPAD(plan.id,4)||CASE WHEN parent_id IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE ' <- ' END||LPAD(plan.parent_id,4) asqlmon_plan_id , plan.id asqlmon_id , plan.parent_id asqlmon_parent_id , LPAD(' ', depth) || plan.operation ||' '|| plan.options || NVL2(plan.object_name, ' ['||plan.object_name ||']', null) asqlmon_operation , sq.session_state , sq.event , sq.avg_p3 , plan.object_alias || CASE WHEN plan.qblock_name IS NOT NULL THEN ' ['|| plan.qblock_name || ']' END obj_alias_qbc_name , CASE WHEN plan.access_predicates IS NOT NULL THEN '[A:] '|| plan.access_predicates END || CASE WHEN plan.filter_predicates IS NOT NULL THEN ' [F:]' || plan.filter_predicates END asqlmon_predicates -- , plan.projection FROM v$sql_plan plan , sq WHERE 1=1 AND sq.sql_id(+) = plan.sql_id AND sq.sql_child_number(+) = plan.child_number AND sq.sql_plan_line_id(+) = plan.id AND sq.sql_plan_hash_value(+) = plan.plan_hash_value AND plan.sql_id LIKE :SQL_ID --AND plan.child_number LIKE '%&2%' ORDER BY --sq.sample_time plan.child_number , plan.plan_hash_value , plan.id

with cpucores as ( select case when (select value from v$osstat where stat_name='NUM_CPU_CORES') is null then (select value from v$osstat where stat_name='NUM_CPUS') else (select value from v$osstat where stat_name='NUM_CPU_CORES') end cpu_cores from dual), event_class as ( select /*+ materialize */ distinct wait_class event from v$event_name where wait_class <> 'Idle' union all select 'CPU + CPU Wait' from dual), ash as ( select /*+ materialize */ ASH.SAMPLE_TIME time_mi, case when ash.session_state = 'ON CPU' then 'CPU + CPU Wait' else wait_class end event from v$active_session_history ash where sample_time > sysdate-5/24/60), ash_timi as ( select dr, row_number() over (partition by dr order by time_mi desc) rn, time_mi, sum(cnt_all) over (partition by dr) cnt_all from ( select trunc((dense_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY time_mi desc))/15) dr, time_mi, count(*) cnt_all from ash group by time_mi)), ash_all_class_timi as ( select * from ash_timi, event_class ), ash_cnt_events as ( select dr, dense_rank() over (partition by dr order by time_mi desc) rn, time_mi, event, sum(cnt) over (partition by dr, event) cnt from ( select trunc((dense_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY time_mi desc))/15) dr, time_mi, event, count(*) cnt from ash group by time_mi, event)) select ac.time_mi, ac.event, ceil(nvl(e.cnt,0)/15) cnt_evnts, ceil(ac.cnt_all/15) all_active_session, round((nvl(e.cnt,0)/nvl(ac.cnt_all,1))*100, 2) perc, c.cpu_cores from ash_all_class_timi ac, ash_cnt_events e, cpucores c where ac.rn=1 and ac.time_mi=e.time_mi(+) and ac.event=e.event(+) and ac.dr=e.dr(+) and ac.rn=e.rn(+) order by 1, 5 desc, 2

SELECT ash.SQL_ID, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) CPU, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) WAIT, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) IO, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 1)) TOTAL, MAX (ash.sample_time) last_executed, (select sql_text from v$sql where sql_id=ash.sql_id and rownum < 2) sql_text FROM v$active_session_history ash WHERE SQL_ID IS NOT NULL AND sample_time > SYSDATE - 2 / (24 * 60) group by ash.sql_id ORDER BY 5 DESC

with sqlstat as ( select --* count(*) over (partition by sql_id) cnt, round(ELAPSED_TIME/greatest(EXECUTIONS,1)/1000000, 3) sec_per_exec, round(CPU_TIME/greatest(EXECUTIONS,1)/1000000, 3) cpu_per_exec, round(DISK_READS/greatest(EXECUTIONS,1)) rds_per_exec, PARSING_SCHEMA_NAME, SQL_ID, PLAN_HASH_VALUE, MODULE, ELAPSED_TIME, EXECUTIONS, LAST_ACTIVE_TIME, SQL_TEXT, CPU_TIME, DISK_READS, SQL_PROFILE, SQL_PATCH, SQL_PLAN_BASELINE, APPLICATION_WAIT_TIME, CONCURRENCY_WAIT_TIME, CLUSTER_WAIT_TIME, USER_IO_WAIT_TIME, PLSQL_EXEC_TIME, JAVA_EXEC_TIME, ROWS_PROCESSED, COMMAND_TYPE, OPTIMIZER_COST, HASH_VALUE, OLD_HASH_VALUE, IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES, PHYSICAL_READ_REQUESTS, PHYSICAL_READ_BYTES, PHYSICAL_WRITE_REQUESTS, PHYSICAL_WRITE_BYTES, LOCKED_TOTAL, PINNED_TOTAL, FIRST_LOAD_TIME from v$sql where LAST_ACTIVE_TIME > sysdate-10/24/60 --and parsing_schema_name not in ('GGADMIN','SYS','SYSTEM') ) select * from sqlstat where sql_id = :SQL_ID order by sql_id, sec_per_exec

with ash_mod as ( select distinct nvl(module, nvl(program, 'OTHER_NULL')) module, count(*) over (partition by nvl(module, nvl(program, 'OTHER_NULL'))) tot_mod, count(*) over () total FROM v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time > SYSDATE - 2 / (24 * 60) ) select ash.*, round(tot_mod/total*100,2) perc from ash_mod ash order by 4 desc

SELECT ash.SQL_ID, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) CPU, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) WAIT, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) IO, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 1)) TOTAL, MAX (ash.sample_time) last_executed, (select sql_text from v$sql where sql_id=ash.sql_id and rownum < 2) sql_text FROM v$active_session_history ash WHERE SQL_ID IS NOT NULL AND sample_time > SYSDATE - 2 / (24 * 60) and nvl(module, nvl(program, 'OTHER_NULL')) = :MODULE group by ash.sql_id ORDER BY 5 DESC

with ash_sess as ( select distinct session_id, session_serial#, user_id, nvl(module, nvl(program, 'OTHER_NULL')) module, session_type, count(*) over (partition by session_id, session_serial#) tot_sess, count(*) over () total FROM v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time > SYSDATE - 2 / (24 * 60) ) select ash.session_id, ash.session_serial#, (select username from dba_users where user_id=ash.user_id) username, ash.module, ash.session_type, ash.tot_sess, ash.total, round(ash.tot_sess/ash.total*100,2) perc from ash_sess ash order by 8 desc

SELECT ash.SQL_ID, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) CPU, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) WAIT, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) IO, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 1)) TOTAL, MAX (ash.sample_time) last_executed, (select sql_text from v$sql where sql_id=ash.sql_id and rownum < 2) sql_text FROM v$active_session_history ash WHERE SQL_ID IS NOT NULL AND sample_time > SYSDATE - 2 / (24 * 60) and session_id=:SESSION_ID group by ash.sql_id ORDER BY 5 DESC

with ash_user as ( select distinct user_id, count(*) over (partition by user_id) tot_user, count(*) over () total FROM v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time > SYSDATE - 2 / (24 * 60) ) select ash.user_id, (select username from dba_users where user_id=ash.user_id) username, ash.tot_user, ash.total, round(tot_user/total*100,2) perc from ash_user ash order by 4 desc

SELECT ash.SQL_ID, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) CPU, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) WAIT, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) IO, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 1)) TOTAL, MAX (ash.sample_time) last_executed, (select sql_text from v$sql where sql_id=ash.sql_id and rownum < 2) sql_text FROM v$active_session_history ash WHERE SQL_ID IS NOT NULL AND sample_time > SYSDATE - 2 / (24 * 60) and user_id=:USER_ID group by ash.sql_id ORDER BY 5 DESC

with ash_evnt as ( select distinct event, count(*) over (partition by event) tot_evt, count(*) over () total FROM v$active_session_history ash where ash.event is not null and ash.sample_time > SYSDATE - 2 / (24 * 60) ) select ash.*, round(tot_evt/total*100,2) perc from ash_evnt ash order by 4 desc
select * from v$session where status = 'ACTIVE' AND service_name = 'SYS$USERS'

SELECT ash.SQL_ID, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) CPU, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) WAIT, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) IO, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 1)) TOTAL, MAX (ash.sample_time) last_executed, (select sql_text from v$sql where sql_id=ash.sql_id and rownum < 2) sql_text FROM v$active_session_history ash WHERE SQL_ID IS NOT NULL AND sample_time > SYSDATE - 2 / (24 * 60) and session_id=:SID and session_serial#=:SERIAL# group by ash.sql_id ORDER BY 5 DESC
SELECT sh.session_id SID,sh.session_serial# SERIAL,sql_id SQLID,sh.user_id USR, sh.* FROM v$active_session_history sh ORDER BY sample_time DESC
SELECT sh.* FROM v$active_session_history sh where session_id =:SID and session_serial#=:SERIAL ORDER BY sample_time DESC
select * from dba_users where user_id =:USR
select * from v$sql where sql_id = :SQLID

with ash_per as ( select /*+ materialize */ * from v$active_session_history where sample_time > sysdate-2/24/60 and plsql_entry_object_id is not null and plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null ), ash_proc as ( select p.object_name, p.procedure_name, a.* from ash_per a, dba_procedures p where object_id = plsql_entry_object_id and subprogram_id=plsql_entry_subprogram_id ), aggr_ash as ( select /*+ materialize */ ash.object_name, ash.procedure_name, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) CPU, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) WAIT, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) IO, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 1)) TOTAL, MAX (ash.sample_time) last_executed from ash_proc ash group by ash.object_name, ash.procedure_name ) select a.*, round(ratio_to_report(CPU) over()*100, 2) proc_cpu, dbms_lob.substr((select wm_concat(s.nm_query) from report.wd_sqlstore s where instr(upper(s.vl_query), a.procedure_name) > 0), 4000) s from aggr_ash a order by 6 desc

with ash_per as ( select /*+ materialize */ * from v$active_session_history where sample_time > sysdate-2/24/60 and plsql_entry_object_id is not null and plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null ), ash_proc as ( select p.object_name, p.procedure_name, a.* from ash_per a, dba_procedures p where object_id = plsql_entry_object_id and subprogram_id=plsql_entry_subprogram_id ), aggr_ash as ( select /*+ materialize */ ash.sql_id, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) CPU, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) WAIT, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) IO, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 1)) TOTAL, MAX (ash.sample_time) last_executed from ash_proc ash where ash.object_name = :OBJECT_NAME and ash.procedure_name = :PROCEDURE_NAME group by ash.sql_id ) select ash.*, round(ratio_to_report(CPU) over()*100, 2) proc_cpu, (select sql_text from v$sqlstats where sql_id=ash.sql_id and rownum < 2) sql_text from aggr_ash ash order by 5 desc

with ash_per as ( select /*+ materialize */ * from v$active_session_history where sample_time > sysdate-5/24/60 and plsql_entry_object_id is not null and plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null ), ash_proc as ( select p.object_name, p.procedure_name, a.* from ash_per a, dba_procedures p where object_id = plsql_entry_object_id and subprogram_id=plsql_entry_subprogram_id ), aggr_ash as ( select /*+ materialize */ ash.sql_id, sql_plan_hash_value, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) CPU, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) WAIT, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) IO, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 1)) TOTAL, MAX (ash.sample_time) last_executed from ash_proc ash where ash.object_name = :OBJECT_NAME and ash.procedure_name = :PROCEDURE_NAME group by ash.sql_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) select ash.*, round(ratio_to_report(CPU) over()*100, 2) proc_cpu, (select sql_text from v$sqlstats where sql_id=ash.sql_id and rownum < 2) sql_text from aggr_ash ash order by 6 desc

SELECT U.USERNAME, h.*,h.session_id FROM V$ACTIVE_SESSION_HISTORY H, DBA_USERS U where U.USER_ID=H.USER_ID and LOWER(USERNAME) like :USR AND SAMPLE_TIME BETWEEN sysdate-1/24 AND sysdate ORDER BY h.session_id, sample_time
select sql_fulltext from v$sql where sql_id=:SQL_ID

select owner||'.'||object_name||':'||nvl(subobject_name,'-') obj_name, dbms_rowid.rowid_create ( 1, o.data_object_id, row_wait_file#, row_wait_block#, row_wait_row# ) row_id from v$session s, dba_objects o where sid = :SESSION_ID and o.data_object_id = s.row_wait_obj#

select time,obj,proc, sum(CPU) sumcpu from (WITH ash_per AS (SELECT /*+ ma terialize */ * FROM v$active_session_history WHERE sample_time > sysdate-1/24 AND plsql_entry_object_id IS NOT NULL AND plsql_entry_subprogram_id IS NOT NULL ), ash_proc AS (SELECT p.object_name, p.procedure_name, a.* FROM ash_per a, dba_procedures p WHERE object_id = plsql_entry_object_id AND subprogram_id=plsql_entry_subprogram_id ) (SELECT ash.object_name obj, ash.procedure_name proc, trunc(ash.sample_time,'mi') time, SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) CPU --SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) WAIT, --SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', DECODE (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) IO, --SUM (DECODE (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 1)) TOTAL, --MAX (ash.sample_time) last_executed, FROM ash_proc ash GROUP BY ash.object_name, ash.procedure_name, ash.sample_time) order by sample_time) group by time,obj,proc order by time,sumcpu desc

select b.*, TO_CHAR (SUBSTR (t.sql_text, 1, 4000)) sql, :X cur_range, :C child_range from ( select a.*, row_number() over (order by a.ms_per_exec desc) rn from ( SELECT s.sql_id, s.snap_id, sn.end_interval_time, SUM (s.elapsed_time_delta) elapsed_time, SUM (s.executions_delta) executions, round(SUM (s.elapsed_time_delta)/(case when SUM (s.executions_delta) = 0 then 1 else SUM (s.executions_delta) end)/1000, 2) ms_per_exec, MAX (s.module) module FROM dba_hist_sqlstat s, dba_hist_snapshot sn WHERE s.snap_id=sn.snap_id and s.module like 'JDBC%' and sn.snap_id = (select max(snap_id)-:X from dba_hist_snapshot) GROUP BY s.sql_id, s.snap_id, sn.end_interval_time ) a ) b, dba_hist_sqltext t where b.sql_id=t.sql_id and rn <=5 order by rn

with sql_id_array as ( select /*+ materialize */ b.sql_id from ( select a.*, row_number() over (order by a.ms_per_exec desc) rn from ( SELECT s.sql_id, round(SUM (s.elapsed_time_delta)/(case when SUM (s.executions_delta) = 0 then 1 else SUM (s.executions_delta) end)/1000, 2) ms_per_exec FROM dba_hist_sqlstat s, dba_hist_snapshot sn WHERE s.snap_id=sn.snap_id and s.module = :MODULE and sn.snap_id = :SNAP_ID GROUP BY s.sql_id, s.snap_id, sn.end_interval_time ) a ) b where rn <=5 ) select --* sql_id, end_interval_time, ms_per_exec, executions from ( SELECT s.sql_id, s.snap_id, sn.end_interval_time, SUM (s.elapsed_time_delta) elapsed_time, SUM (s.cpu_time_delta) cpu_time, SUM (s.executions_delta) executions, round(SUM (s.elapsed_time_delta)/(case when SUM (s.executions_delta) = 0 then 1 else SUM (s.executions_delta) end)/1000, 2) ms_per_exec FROM dba_hist_sqlstat s, dba_hist_snapshot sn WHERE s.snap_id=sn.snap_id and s.snap_id >= :SNAP_ID-:CHILD_RANGE AND s.snap_id <= :SNAP_ID and sql_id in (select * from sql_id_array) GROUP BY s.sql_id,s.snap_id, sn.end_interval_time ) order by end_interval_time

with aggr_ash as ( select /*+ noparallel */ --p.object_name, p.procedure_name, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed, ash.plsql_entry_object_id, ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id , inst_id from gv$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time > sysdate-:SEC/24/60/60 --ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) --and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) --and ash.plsql_entry_object_id is not null and ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null group by ash.plsql_entry_object_id, ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id ,inst_id ) select /*+ ordered */ rownum, inst_id, p.object_name, p.procedure_name, round(ratio_to_report(TOTAL) over()*100, 2) proc_total, ash.* --, dbms_lob.substr((select wm_concat(s.nm_query) from report.wd_sqlstore s where instr(upper(s.vl_query), a.procedure_name) > 0), 4000) s from aggr_ash ash,-- dba_objects o, dba_procedures p where ash.plsql_entry_object_id =p.object_id (+) --and p.owner=o.owner and p.object_name=o.object_name and ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id =p.subprogram_id (+) order by proc_total desc

select rownum,duration durations,sql_id ,sql_exec_start , cnt, case when (select to_char(substr(sql_text,1,200)) from dba_hist_sqltext where sql_id= aa.sql_id)is not null then(select to_char(substr(sql_text,1,200)) from dba_hist_sqltext where sql_id= aa.sql_id) else (select max( sql_text) from v$sqltext where sql_id= aa.sql_id and piece=0) end sqltxt from (select sql_id, sql_exec_start,sql_exec_id,max(sample_time)-min(sample_time) duration ,count(*) cnt from v$active_session_history where sample_time>sysdate-1/24 and sql_exec_start is not null and sql_exec_start >sysdate-1/24 group by sql_id,sql_exec_start,sql_exec_id) aa where duration>interval '0' second order by duration desc

SELECT distinct s.username, s.sid, s.serial#, s.osuser, u.tablespace, u.contents, u.segtype, u.extents, u.blocks from V$SESSION S, V$SORT_USAGE U WHERE s.saddr=u.session_addr order by s.username, s.osuser

with ash_blocked as ( select /*+ inline */ blocking_session, blocking_session_serial#, blocking_inst_id sess_blocking_inst_id, count(*) cnt_blocked from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and blocking_session is not null group by blocking_session, blocking_session_serial#, blocking_inst_id ), ash_sess as ( select /*+ materialize */ ash.session_id, ash.session_serial#, b.sess_blocking_inst_id, b.cnt_blocked, count(*) cnt, ash.program, ash.module, ash.action, ash.machine, ash.user_id, ash.blocking_session, ash.blocking_session_serial#, ash.blocking_inst_id, sum(case when ash.session_state = 'WAITING' then 1 else 0 end) waiting, sum(case when ash.in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when ash.in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when ash.in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when ash.in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when ash.in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when ash.in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when ash.in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when ash.in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when ash.in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load from v$active_session_history ash, ash_blocked b where ash.session_id = b.blocking_session and ash.session_serial#=b.blocking_session_serial# and ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) group by ash.session_id, ash.session_serial#, ash.program, ash.module, ash.action, ash.machine, ash.user_id, ash.blocking_session, ash.blocking_session_serial#, ash.blocking_inst_id, b.sess_blocking_inst_id, b.cnt_blocked ) select :TIME_MI TIME_MI_LV2, a.* from ( select connect_by_iscycle "Cycle", level lvl, sys_connect_by_path(session_id, ' < ') "Path", s.* from ash_sess s start with blocking_session is null connect by nocycle prior session_id=blocking_session and prior session_serial#=blocking_session_serial# ) a

with ash_sql as ( select case when ash.event is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.event end event, case when ash.wait_class is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.wait_class end wait_class, count(*) cnt from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.session_id = :SESSION_ID and ash.session_serial# = :SESSION_SERIAL# group by ash.event, ash.wait_class ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, a.*, round(ratio_to_report(CNT) over()*100, 2) proc_total from ash_sql a order by 5 desc

with ash_sql as ( select ash.sql_id, ash.user_id, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state,'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed from v$active_session_history ash where sql_id is not null and sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.session_id = :SESSION_ID and ash.session_serial# = :SESSION_SERIAL# group by ash.sql_id, ash.user_id ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, a.cpu, a.wait, a.io, a.total, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_execution, u.username, a.sql_id, (select s.sql_text from v$sqlstats s where s.sql_id=a.sql_id) txt, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load from ash_sql a, dba_users u where a.user_id=u.user_id order by 5 desc

with aggr_ash as ( select /*+ materialize */ p.object_name, p.procedure_name, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed from v$active_session_history ash, dba_procedures p where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.session_id = :SESSION_ID and ash.session_serial# = :SESSION_SERIAL# and ash.plsql_entry_object_id is not null and ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null and p.object_id = ash.plsql_entry_object_id and p.subprogram_id=ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id group by p.object_name, p.procedure_name ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, round(ratio_to_report(TOTAL) over()*100, 2) proc_total, a.* --, dbms_lob.substr((select wm_concat(s.nm_query) from report.wd_sqlstore s where instr(upper(s.vl_query), a.procedure_name) > 0), 4000) s from aggr_ash a order by 2 desc

with ash_sql as ( select a.session_id, a.session_serial#, a.program, a.module, a.action, a.machine, u.username, a.cnt, a.waiting, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_execution, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load, a.sql_id from ( select session_id, session_serial#, program, module, action, machine, user_id, sql_id, count(*) cnt, sum(case when session_state = 'WAITING' then 1 else 0 end) waiting, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.blocking_session = :SESSION_ID and ash.blocking_session_serial# = :SESSION_SERIAL# and blocking_inst_id = :SESS_BLOCKING_INST_ID group by session_id, session_serial#, program, module, action, machine, user_id, sql_id ) a, dba_users u where a.user_id=u.user_id ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, a.* from ash_sql a order by cnt desc

with ash_blocked as ( select /*+ inline */ blocking_session, blocking_session_serial#, blocking_inst_id sess_blocking_inst_id, count(*) cnt_blocked from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and blocking_session is not null group by blocking_session, blocking_session_serial#, blocking_inst_id ), ash_sess as ( select /*+ materialize */ ash.session_id, ash.session_serial#, b.sess_blocking_inst_id, b.cnt_blocked, count(*) cnt, ash.program, ash.module, ash.action, ash.machine, ash.user_id, ash.blocking_session, ash.blocking_session_serial#, ash.blocking_inst_id, sum(case when ash.session_state = 'WAITING' then 1 else 0 end) waiting, sum(case when ash.in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when ash.in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when ash.in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when ash.in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when ash.in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when ash.in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when ash.in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when ash.in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when ash.in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load from v$active_session_history ash, ash_blocked b where ash.session_id = b.blocking_session and ash.session_serial#=b.blocking_session_serial# and ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) group by ash.session_id, ash.session_serial#, ash.program, ash.module, ash.action, ash.machine, ash.user_id, ash.blocking_session, ash.blocking_session_serial#, ash.blocking_inst_id, b.sess_blocking_inst_id, b.cnt_blocked ) select :TIME_MI TIME_MI_LV2, s.* from ash_sess s order by cnt_blocked desc

with ash_sql as ( select case when ash.event is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.event end event, case when ash.wait_class is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.wait_class end wait_class, count(*) cnt from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.session_id = :SESSION_ID and ash.session_serial# = :SESSION_SERIAL# group by ash.event, ash.wait_class ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, a.*, round(ratio_to_report(CNT) over()*100, 2) proc_total from ash_sql a order by 5 desc

with ash_sql as ( select ash.sql_id, ash.user_id, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state,'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed from v$active_session_history ash where sql_id is not null and sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.session_id = :SESSION_ID and ash.session_serial# = :SESSION_SERIAL# group by ash.sql_id, ash.user_id ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, a.cpu, a.wait, a.io, a.total, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_execution, u.username, a.sql_id, (select s.sql_text from v$sqlstats s where s.sql_id=a.sql_id) txt, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load from ash_sql a, dba_users u where a.user_id=u.user_id order by 5 desc

with aggr_ash as ( select /*+ materialize */ p.object_name, p.procedure_name, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed from v$active_session_history ash, dba_procedures p where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.session_id = :SESSION_ID and ash.session_serial# = :SESSION_SERIAL# and ash.plsql_entry_object_id is not null and ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null and p.object_id = ash.plsql_entry_object_id and p.subprogram_id=ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id group by p.object_name, p.procedure_name ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, round(ratio_to_report(TOTAL) over()*100, 2) proc_total, a.* --, dbms_lob.substr((select wm_concat(s.nm_query) from report.wd_sqlstore s where instr(upper(s.vl_query), a.procedure_name) > 0), 4000) s from aggr_ash a order by 2 desc

with ash_sql as ( select a.session_id, a.session_serial#, a.program, a.module, a.action, a.machine, u.username, a.cnt, a.waiting, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_execution, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load, a.sql_id from ( select session_id, session_serial#, program, module, action, machine, user_id, sql_id, count(*) cnt, sum(case when session_state = 'WAITING' then 1 else 0 end) waiting, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.blocking_session = :SESSION_ID and ash.blocking_session_serial# = :SESSION_SERIAL# and blocking_inst_id = :SESS_BLOCKING_INST_ID group by session_id, session_serial#, program, module, action, machine, user_id, sql_id ) a, dba_users u where a.user_id=u.user_id ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, a.* from ash_sql a order by cnt desc

with ash_stats as ( select sql_id, sql_plan_hash_value, sql_child_number, sql_exec_id, min(sample_time) mn_tim, max(sample_time) mx_tim, count(*) cnt from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and sql_id = :SQL_ID group by sql_id, sql_plan_hash_value, sql_child_number, sql_exec_id ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, a.*, s.parsing_schema_name, s.sql_text, s.sql_fulltext, s.sql_profile, s.sql_patch, s.sql_plan_baseline, s.program_id, s.program_line#, s.last_active_time, s.io_interconnect_bytes, s.physical_read_requests, s.physical_read_bytes, s.physical_write_requests, s.physical_write_bytes from ash_stats a, v$sql s where a.sql_id = s.sql_id and a.sql_plan_hash_value=s.plan_hash_value and a.sql_child_number=s.child_number order by mx_tim desc

with ash_sql as ( select a.session_id, a.session_serial#, a.program, a.module, a.action, a.machine, u.username, a.cnt, a.waiting, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_execution, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load, a.sql_id from ( select session_id, session_serial#, program, module, action, machine, user_id, sql_id, count(*) cnt, sum(case when session_state = 'WAITING' then 1 else 0 end) waiting, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load from v$active_session_history ash, dba_procedures p where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.plsql_entry_object_id is not null and ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null and p.object_id = ash.plsql_entry_object_id and p.subprogram_id=ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id and p.object_name = :OBJECT_NAME and (p.procedure_name = :PROCEDURE_NAME or p.procedure_name is null) group by session_id, session_serial#, program, module, action, machine, user_id, sql_id ) a, dba_users u where a.user_id=u.user_id ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, round(ratio_to_report(CNT) over()*100, 2) proc_total, a.*, :OBJECT_NAME, :PROCEDURE_NAME from ash_sql a order by 2 desc

with ash_sql as ( select ash.sql_id, ash.sql_plan_hash_value, ash.sql_child_number, ash.sql_exec_id, ash.user_id, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state,'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total_dur, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, min(sample_time) mn_tim, max(sample_time) mx_tim from v$active_session_history ash, dba_procedures p where sql_id is not null and sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.plsql_entry_object_id is not null and ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null and p.object_id = ash.plsql_entry_object_id and p.subprogram_id=ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id and p.object_name = :OBJECT_NAME and (p.procedure_name = :PROCEDURE_NAME or p.procedure_name is null) group by ash.sql_id, ash.sql_plan_hash_value, ash.sql_child_number, ash.sql_exec_id, ash.user_id ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, a.sql_plan_hash_value, a.sql_child_number, a.sql_exec_id, a.cpu, a.wait, a.io, a.total_dur, a.in_plsql_execution, u.username, a.sql_id, (select s.sql_text from v$sqlstats s where s.sql_id=a.sql_id) txt, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load, s.parsing_schema_name, s.sql_text, s.sql_fulltext, s.sql_profile, s.sql_patch, s.sql_plan_baseline, s.program_id, s.program_line#, s.last_active_time, s.io_interconnect_bytes, s.physical_read_requests, s.physical_read_bytes, s.physical_write_requests, s.physical_write_bytes, a.mn_tim, mx_tim, :OBJECT_NAME, :PROCEDURE_NAME from ash_sql a, dba_users u, v$sql s where a.user_id=u.user_id and a.sql_id = s.sql_id and a.sql_plan_hash_value=s.plan_hash_value and a.sql_child_number=s.child_number order by mx_tim desc

with cpucores as ( select case when (select value from v$osstat where stat_name='NUM_CPU_CORES') is null then (select value from v$osstat where stat_name='NUM_CPUS') else (select value from v$osstat where stat_name='NUM_CPU_CORES') end cpu_cores from dual), event_class as ( select /*+ materialize */ distinct wait_class event from v$event_name where wait_class <> 'Idle' union all select 'CPU + CPU Wait' from dual), ash as ( select /*+ materialize */ ASH.SAMPLE_TIME time_mi, case when ash.session_state = 'ON CPU' then 'CPU + CPU Wait' else wait_class end event from v$active_session_history ash where sample_time > sysdate-20/24/60), ash_timi as ( select dr, row_number() over (partition by dr order by time_mi desc) rn, time_mi, sum(cnt_all) over (partition by dr) cnt_all from ( select trunc((dense_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY time_mi desc))/30) dr, time_mi, count(*) cnt_all from ash group by time_mi)), ash_all_class_timi as ( select * from ash_timi, event_class ), ash_cnt_events as ( select dr, dense_rank() over (partition by dr order by time_mi desc) rn, time_mi, event, sum(cnt) over (partition by dr, event) cnt from ( select trunc((dense_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY time_mi desc))/30) dr, time_mi, event, count(*) cnt from ash group by time_mi, event)) select to_timestamp(to_char(ac.time_mi, 'dd.mm.yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd.mm.yyyy hh24:mi:ss') TIME_MI, ac.event, ceil(nvl(e.cnt,0)/30) cnt_evnts, ceil(ac.cnt_all/30) all_active_session, round((nvl(e.cnt,0)/nvl(ac.cnt_all,1))*100, 2) perc, c.cpu_cores from ash_all_class_timi ac, ash_cnt_events e, cpucores c where ac.rn=1 and ac.time_mi=e.time_mi(+) and ac.event=e.event(+) and ac.dr=e.dr(+) and ac.rn=e.rn(+) order by 1, 5 desc, 2

with ash_sql as ( select ash.sql_id, ash.user_id, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state,'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed from v$active_session_history ash where sql_id is not null and sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) group by ash.sql_id, ash.user_id ) select :TIME_MI time_mi_lv2, a.cpu, a.wait, a.io, a.total, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_execution, u.username, a.sql_id, (select s.sql_text from v$sqlstats s where s.sql_id=a.sql_id) txt, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load from ash_sql a, dba_users u where a.user_id=u.user_id order by 5 desc

with aggr_ash as ( select /*+ materialize */ p.object_name, p.procedure_name, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed from v$active_session_history ash, dba_procedures p where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.plsql_entry_object_id is not null and ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null and p.object_id = ash.plsql_entry_object_id and p.subprogram_id=ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id group by p.object_name, p.procedure_name ) select :TIME_MI TIME_MI_LV2, round(ratio_to_report(TOTAL) over()*100, 2) proc_total, a.* --, dbms_lob.substr((select wm_concat(s.nm_query) from report.wd_sqlstore s where instr(upper(s.vl_query), a.procedure_name) > 0), 4000) s from aggr_ash a order by 2 desc

with ash_sql as ( select case when ash.event is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.event end event_name, case when ash.wait_class is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.wait_class end wait_class, count(*) cnt from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) group by ash.event, ash.wait_class ) select :TIME_MI TIME_MI_LV2, a.*, round(ratio_to_report(CNT) over()*100, 2) proc_total from ash_sql a order by 5 desc

with ash_sql as ( select ash.sql_id, ash.user_id, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state,'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sql_id is not null and ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and case when ash.wait_class is null then 'CPU + CPU Wait' else ash.wait_class end =:EVENT group by ash.sql_id, ash.user_id ) select :TIME_MI TIME_MI_LV2, a.cpu, a.wait, a.io, a.total, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_execution, u.username, a.sql_id, (select s.sql_text from v$sqlstats s where s.sql_id=a.sql_id) txt, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load, :EVENT WAIT_CLASS from ash_sql a, dba_users u where a.user_id=u.user_id order by 5 desc

with aggr_ash as ( select /*+ materialize */ p.object_name, p.procedure_name, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed from v$active_session_history ash, dba_procedures p where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and case when wait_class is null then 'CPU + CPU Wait' else wait_class end =:EVENT and ash.plsql_entry_object_id is not null and ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null and p.object_id = ash.plsql_entry_object_id and p.subprogram_id=ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id group by p.object_name, p.procedure_name ) select :TIME_MI TIME_MI_LV2, round(ratio_to_report(TOTAL) over()*100, 2) proc_total, a.*, :EVENT WAIT_CLASS --, dbms_lob.substr((select wm_concat(s.nm_query) from report.wd_sqlstore s where instr(upper(s.vl_query), a.procedure_name) > 0), 4000) s from aggr_ash a order by 2 desc

with ash_blocked as ( select /*+ inline */ blocking_session, blocking_session_serial#, blocking_inst_id sess_blocking_inst_id, count(*) cnt_blocked from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and blocking_session is not null group by blocking_session, blocking_session_serial#, blocking_inst_id ), ash_sess as ( select /*+ materialize */ ash.session_id, ash.session_serial#, b.sess_blocking_inst_id, b.cnt_blocked, count(*) cnt, ash.program, ash.module, ash.action, ash.machine, ash.user_id, ash.blocking_session, ash.blocking_session_serial#, ash.blocking_inst_id, sum(case when ash.session_state = 'WAITING' then 1 else 0 end) waiting, sum(case when ash.in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when ash.in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when ash.in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when ash.in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when ash.in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when ash.in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when ash.in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when ash.in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when ash.in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load from v$active_session_history ash, ash_blocked b where ash.session_id = b.blocking_session and ash.session_serial#=b.blocking_session_serial# and ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) group by ash.session_id, ash.session_serial#, ash.program, ash.module, ash.action, ash.machine, ash.user_id, ash.blocking_session, ash.blocking_session_serial#, ash.blocking_inst_id, b.sess_blocking_inst_id, b.cnt_blocked ) select :TIME_MI TIME_MI_LV2, a.* from ( select connect_by_iscycle "Cycle", level lvl, sys_connect_by_path(session_id, ' < ') "Path", s.* from ash_sess s start with blocking_session is null connect by nocycle prior session_id=blocking_session and prior session_serial#=blocking_session_serial# ) a

with ash_sql as ( select a.session_id, a.session_serial#, a.program, a.module, a.action, a.machine, u.username, a.cnt, a.waiting, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_execution, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load, a.sql_id from ( select session_id, session_serial#, program, module, action, machine, user_id, sql_id, count(*) cnt, sum(case when session_state = 'WAITING' then 1 else 0 end) waiting, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) group by session_id, session_serial#, program, module, action, machine, user_id, sql_id ) a, dba_users u where a.user_id=u.user_id ) select :TIME_MI TIME_MI_LV2, round(ratio_to_report(CNT) over()*100, 2) proc_total, a.* from ash_sql a order by 2 desc

with ash_blocked as ( select /*+ inline */ blocking_session, blocking_session_serial#, blocking_inst_id sess_blocking_inst_id, count(*) cnt_blocked from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and blocking_session is not null group by blocking_session, blocking_session_serial#, blocking_inst_id ), ash_sess as ( select /*+ materialize */ ash.session_id, ash.session_serial#, b.sess_blocking_inst_id, b.cnt_blocked, count(*) cnt, ash.program, ash.module, ash.action, ash.machine, ash.user_id, ash.blocking_session, ash.blocking_session_serial#, ash.blocking_inst_id, sum(case when ash.session_state = 'WAITING' then 1 else 0 end) waiting, sum(case when ash.in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when ash.in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when ash.in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when ash.in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when ash.in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when ash.in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when ash.in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when ash.in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when ash.in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load from v$active_session_history ash, ash_blocked b where ash.session_id = b.blocking_session and ash.session_serial#=b.blocking_session_serial# and ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) group by ash.session_id, ash.session_serial#, ash.program, ash.module, ash.action, ash.machine, ash.user_id, ash.blocking_session, ash.blocking_session_serial#, ash.blocking_inst_id, b.sess_blocking_inst_id, b.cnt_blocked ) select :TIME_MI TIME_MI_LV2, s.* from ash_sess s order by cnt_blocked desc

with vs as (select rownum rnum, inst_id, sid, serial#, status, username, last_call_et, command, machine, osuser, module, action, resource_consumer_group, client_info, client_identifier, type, terminal, sql_id from gv$session) select vs.inst_id, vs.sid ,serial# serial, vs.sql_id, vs.username "Username", case when vs.status = 'ACTIVE' then last_call_et else null end "Seconds in Wait", decode(vs.command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(vs.command)) "Command", vs.machine "Machine", vs.osuser "OS User", lower(vs.status) "Status", vs.module "Module", vs.action "Action", vs.resource_consumer_group, vs.client_info, vs.client_identifier from vs where vs.USERNAME is not null and nvl(vs.osuser,'x') <> 'SYSTEM' and vs.type <> 'BACKGROUND' order by 1,2,3
