display.description: The Current or last SQL for the selected session
display.tooltip: The Current or last SQL for the selected session

query.sql: select replace(q.SQL_FULLTEXT,chr(0)) sql_text from gv$session s,gv$sql q where s.sql_address = q.address and s.sql_hash_value = q.hash_value and s.sid = :SID

SELECT sp.inst_id, plan_hash_value,LPAD(' ',4*(DEPTH-1))||operation||' '||options ||' '||object_name ||' '||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = '||position) "Query Plan",lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality > 1000000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000000)) || 'M' WHEN cardinality > 1000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000)) || 'K' ELSE cardinality || ' ' END , 6 , ' ' ) AS "Rows" -- nvl(entries,0) as "Rowsource Time" FROM gv$sql_plan sp /*,(select sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) entries from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and sql_exec_id = (select sql_exec_id from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum=1) group by sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+)= sp.id ORDER by sp.plan_hash_value, sp.id */ WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID order by sp.plan_hash_value,sp.inst_id,sp.child_address,sp.id

SELECT LPAD(' ',4*(DEPTH-1))||operation||' '||options ||' '||object_name ||' '||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = '||position) "Query Plan",lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality > 1000000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000000)) || 'M' WHEN cardinality > 1000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000)) || 'K' ELSE cardinality || ' ' END , 6 , ' ' ) AS "Rows", nvl(entries,0) as "Rowsource Time(s)" FROM gv$sql_plan sp,(select sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) entries from gv$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and sql_exec_id = (select sql_exec_id from gv$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum=1) group by sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+)= sp.id ORDER by sp.plan_hash_value, sp.id
select event,p1,p2, case when p3 = 0 then null else p3 end p3 from gv$session_wait where sid = :SID

select s.SID,s.status,s.username,s.process,s.LOGON_TIME, s.logon_time since,s.server,s.type,p.spid,p.TRACEID, s.serial# from gv$session s, gv$process p where s.sid = :SID and s.serial# = :SERIAL and s.inst_id = :INST_ID and s.paddr = p.addr and s.inst_id = p.inst_id
select osuser,machine,terminal,CLIENT_INFO,CLIENT_IDENTIFIER from gv$session where sid = :SID and serial# = :SERIAL and inst_id = :INST_ID

select decode(command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(command)) "Command" ,LAST_CALL_ET,program,module,action from gv$session where sid = :SID

with locks as( select session_id,lock_type, mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2,blocking_others from sys.dba_lock), waiters as ( select w.session_id waiting_session, h.session_id holding_session, w.lock_type lock_type, h.mode_held mode_held, w.mode_requested mode_requested, w.lock_id1, w.lock_id2 from locks w, locks h where h.blocking_others = 'Blocking' and h.mode_held != 'None' and h.mode_held != 'Null' and w.mode_requested != 'None' and w.lock_type = h.lock_type and w.lock_id1 = h.lock_id1 and w.lock_id2 = h.lock_id2 and (w.session_id = :SID or h.session_id = :SID)), blockers as( select holding_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters minus select waiting_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters), waiters_blockers as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from waiters union all select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from blockers), lock_objects as( select session_id,cnt lock_obj_count, case when cnt = 1 then object_name else null end object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from( select session_id,count(distinct object_name) cnt,max(object_name) object_name, max(lo.object_id) object_id, max(ao.owner) owner,max(object_type) object_type from gv$locked_object lo,all_objects ao,waiters_blockers wb where lo.object_id = ao.object_id and (wb.waiting_session = lo.session_id or wb.holding_session = lo.session_id) group by session_id)), wait_block_ses as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested, s.username,s.osuser,s.CLIENT_INFO,s.CLIENT_IDENTIFIER,o.object_name,o.owner,o.object_id,module,o.object_type,o.lock_obj_count, decode(s.command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(s.command)) command from waiters_blockers wb, gv$session s, lock_objects o where s.sid = wb.waiting_session and o.session_id(+) = wb.waiting_session ) select case when holding_session is null then 'Lock' else 'Lock Waiting' end status, waiting_session, username, object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from wait_block_ses start with holding_session is null connect by prior waiting_session = holding_session

SELECT TRUNC(sl.elapsed_seconds/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.elapsed_seconds,60) elapsed, TRUNC(sl.time_remaining/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.time_remaining,60) remaining, ROUND(sl.sofar/sl.totalwork*100, 2) progress_pct, inst_id FROM gv$session_longops sl WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID AND time_remaining > 0
select * from dba_objects where regexp_like(owner,'(BYT)|(PROM)') order by last_ddl_time desc nulls last,created desc

select 'alter index '||owner||'.'||index_name||' rebuild;' sql from dba_indexes where status='UNUSABLE' union all select 'alter index '||index_owner||'.'||index_name|| ' rebuild partition '||partition_name||';' from dba_ind_partitions where status='UNUSABLE' union all select 'alter index '||index_owner||'.'||index_name|| ' rebuild subpartition '||subpartition_name||';' from dba_ind_subpartitions where status='UNUSABLE';
select distinct 'EXEC DBMS_UTILITY.COMPILE_SCHEMA (schema => '''||owner||''', compile_all=>FALSE);' from dba_objects where status <> 'VALID';
select DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL(:v_object,:v_name,:v_owner) from DUAL
select name,consumed_cpu_time from v$rsrc_consumer_group where name not like 'ORA$%'
select dbms_flashback.get_system_change_number from dual
select * from GV$STREAMS_TRANSACTION
select * from GV$TRANSACTION
SELECT LOCAL_TRAN_ID LTI, STATE, FAIL_TIME, TOP_OS_USER, TOP_OS_TERMINAL FROM SYS.PENDING_TRANS$

select 'COMMIT FORCE '''||LOCAL_TRAN_ID||'' from SYS.PENDING_TRANS$ where LOCAL_TRAN_ID=:LTI; select 'EXEC DBMS_TRANSACTION.PURGE_LOST_DB_ENTRY('''||LOCAL_TRAN_ID||''')' from SYS.PENDING_TRANS$ where LOCAL_TRAN_ID=:LTI;
select reason,message_type from DBA_OUTSTANDING_ALERTS
select * from DBA_OUTSTANDING_ALERTS
select * from dba_thresholds
select * from DBA_TABLESPACE_THRESHOLDS

select * from dba_tablespaces ts where TS.TABLESPACE_NAME not in (select tablespace_name from DBA_TABLESPACE_THRESHOLDS tt where TS.TABLESPACE_NAME=tt.tablespace_name and metrics_name = 'Tablespace Bytes Space Usage')
select * from DBA_ALERT_HISTORY order by creation_time desc
SELECT NVL(owner,'ALL_DB_SIZE') "OWNER", TO_CHAR((SUM(bytes)/1024/1024),'9999999.99') "SIZE_MB" FROM dba_segments where owner = :SCM GROUP BY rollup(owner) ORDER BY 2 DESC
select SEGMENT_NAME "SEGMENT", to_char((SUM(bytes)/1024/1024),'9999999.99') "SIZE_MB" from DBA_SEGMENTS where owner=:OWNER and segment_type like '%TABLE%' group by OWNER,SEGMENT_NAME order by 2 desc

SELECT RTIME, USED_mb, (USED_mb - LAG(USED_mb) OVER(order BY RTIME)) u_growth_mb, size_mb, (size_mb - LAG(size_mb) OVER(order BY RTIME)) s_growth_mb FROM ( SELECT RTIME, TRUNC(SUM(TABLESPACE_USEDSIZE)/1024) USED_mb, TRUNC(SUM(TABLESPACE_SIZE)/1024) size_mb FROM dba_hist_tbspc_space_usage GROUP BY RTIME) ORDER BY RTIME DESC

select trunc(rtime) rt, max(usg) usg from ( SELECT rtime, SUM(usg) usg FROM (SELECT to_date(rtime,'mm.dd.yyyy hh24:mi:ss') rtime, tablespace_id tid, ROUND((TABLESPACE_SIZE*16*1024)/1024/1024,2) usg FROM dBA_HIST_TBSPC_SPACE_USAGE ) GROUP BY rtime ) where trunc(rtime)>sysdate-365 group by trunc(rtime) ORDER BY 1

SELECT TRUNC(rtime) rtime, name, MAX(USEDSIZE_MB) USEDSIZE_MB, MAX(SIZE_MB) SIZE_MB, MAX(MAXSIZE_MB) MAXSIZE_MB FROM (SELECT to_date(rtime,'mm.dd.yyyy hh24:mi:ss') rtime, NAME, ROUND((TABLESPACE_SIZE *:BLK_SZ *1024)/1024/1024,2) SIZE_MB, ROUND((TABLESPACE_MAXSIZE *:BLK_SZ *1024)/1024/1024,2) MAXSIZE_MB, ROUND((TABLESPACE_USEDSIZE*:BLK_SZ *1024)/1024/1024,2) USEDSIZE_MB FROM DBA_HIST_TBSPC_SPACE_USAGE A JOIN V$TABLESPACE B ON (A.TABLESPACE_ID = B.TS#) JOIN DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT C ON (A.SNAP_ID = C.SNAP_ID) WHERE NAME =:TBS and to_date(rtime,'mm.dd.yyyy hh24:mi:ss') > sysdate - :DAYS_BACK ) GROUP BY TRUNC(rtime), name ORDER BY 1
select group_number GROUP_NO, name, state,total_mb, free_mb from v$asm_diskgroup
select type,count(*),sum(bytes)/1024/1024/1024 from V$ASM_FILE where group_number=:GROUP_NO group by type order by 2 desc

with rec as (SELECT COUNT(*) AS tbs_cnt,min(file_id) as min_file_id, tablespace_name, ROUND (SUM(bytes /1024/1024/1024)) AS tot_size, ROUND (SUM(maxbytes/1024/1024/1024) ) AS max_size, ROUND (SUM(maxbytes/1024/1024/1024) ) -ROUND (SUM(bytes/1024/1024/1024)) AS free_gb, 100 * ROUND (SUM(bytes/1024/1024/1024)/ SUM( NVL(NULLIF( maxbytes , 0),bytes) /1024/1024/1024),3) AS pct_to_grow FROM dba_data_files GROUP BY tablespace_name HAVING 100* ROUND (SUM(bytes/1024/1024/1024)/ SUM( NVL(NULLIF( maxbytes , 0),bytes) /1024/1024/1024),3) >75 --and ROUND (SUM(NVL(NULLIF( maxbytes , 0),bytes)/1024/1024/1024) ) -ROUND (SUM(bytes/1024/1024/1024)) < 100 ) select rec.tbs_cnt,rec.tablespace_name,rec.tot_size,rec.max_size,rec.free_gb,rec.pct_to_grow, 'alter tablespace '||rec.tablespace_name|| ' add datafile '''|| substr(d.file_name,1,length (d.file_name) -4) ||'_'|| to_char (rec.tbs_cnt +1) ||'.ora'' size 10M AUTOEXTEND ON NEXT 100M MAXSIZE unlimited;' AS ADD_DATAFILE from dba_data_files d,rec where d.file_id = rec.min_file_id;
SELECT NAME, PHYRDS,PHYWRTS, PHYRDS+PHYWRTS SUM FROM V$DATAFILE DF, V$FILESTAT FS WHERE DF.FILE#=FS.FILE# order by 4 desc

SELECT event, p3 AS "BLOCKS", sql_plan_operation || ' ' || sql_plan_options, COUNT(*) FROM dba_hist_active_sess_history WHERE p1text = 'file#' AND p3text = 'blocks' AND session_state = 'WAITING' AND p1 IN (SELECT file_id FROM dba_data_files WHERE tablespace_name IN (SELECT tablespace_name FROM dba_tablespaces WHERE contents = 'UNDO' ) ) GROUP BY EVENT, P3, SQL_PLAN_OPERATION || ' ' || SQL_PLAN_OPTIONS ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT owner,"table", ins,dels,upds, "all",ROUND (RATIO_TO_REPORT ("all") OVER () * 100, 2) "%" from (SELECT TABLE_OWNER OWNER, TABLE_NAME "table", SUM(INSERTS) INS, SUM(UPDATES) DELS, SUM(DELETES) upds, SUM(INSERTS)+ SUM(UPDATES)+ SUM(DELETES) "all" FROM sys.all_TAB_MODIFICATIONS GROUP BY TABLE_OWNER, table_name order by SUM(INSERTS)+ SUM(UPDATES)+ SUM(DELETES) desc)
SELECT NVL(owner,'ALL_DB_SIZE') "OWNER", TO_CHAR((SUM(bytes)/1024/1024),'9999999.99') "SIZE_MB" FROM dba_segments GROUP BY rollup(owner) ORDER BY 2 DESC
SELECT segment_name, TO_CHAR((SUM(bytes)/1024/1024),'9999999.99') "SIZE_MB" FROM dba_segments where owner=:OWNER group by segment_name ORDER BY 2 DESC
select * from gv$asm_operation

SELECT b.tsname tablespace_name, MAX (b.used_size_mb) cur_used_size_mb, ROUND (AVG (inc_used_size_mb), 2) avg_increas_mb FROM (SELECT a.days, a.tsname, used_size_mb, used_size_mb - LAG (used_size_mb, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY a.tsname ORDER BY a.tsname, a.days) inc_used_size_mb FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR (sp.begin_interval_time, 'MM-DD-YYYY') days, ts.tsname, MAX ( ROUND ( (tsu.tablespace_usedsize * dt.block_size) / (1024 * 1024), 2)) used_size_mb FROM DBA_HIST_TBSPC_SPACE_USAGE tsu, DBA_HIST_TABLESPACE_STAT ts, DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT sp, DBA_TABLESPACES dt WHERE tsu.tablespace_id = ts.ts# AND tsu.snap_id = sp.snap_id AND ts.tsname = dt.tablespace_name AND sp.begin_interval_time > SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY TO_CHAR (sp.begin_interval_time, 'MM-DD-YYYY'), ts.tsname ORDER BY ts.tsname, days) A) b GROUP BY b.tsname ORDER BY b.tsname

select a.tablespace_name, a.physical_bytes/(1024*1024) "Current allocated (MB)", nvl(b.tot_used,0)/(1024*1024) "used (MB)", a.bytes_alloc/(1024*1024) "Max Ext (MB)", trunc((nvl(b.tot_used,0)/a.bytes_alloc)*100,2) "TOTAL % USED" from ( select tablespace_name, sum(bytes) physical_bytes, sum(decode(autoextensible,'NO',bytes,'YES',maxbytes)) bytes_alloc from dba_data_files group by tablespace_name ) a, ( select tablespace_name, sum(bytes) tot_used from dba_segments group by tablespace_name ) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name (+) --and (nvl(b.tot_used,0)/a.bytes_alloc)*100 > 10 and a.tablespace_name not in (select distinct tablespace_name from dba_temp_files) and a.tablespace_name not like 'UNDO%' order by 5 desc

SELECT DB_NAME, HOSTNAME, LOG_ARCHIVED, LOG_APPLIED, APPLIED_TIME, LOG_ARCHIVED - LOG_APPLIED LOG_GAP FROM (SELECT NAME DB_NAME FROM V$DATABASE), (SELECT UPPER ( SUBSTR ( HOST_NAME, 1, (DECODE (INSTR (HOST_NAME, '.'), 0, LENGTH (HOST_NAME), (INSTR (HOST_NAME, '.') - 1))))) HOSTNAME FROM V$INSTANCE), (SELECT MAX (SEQUENCE#) LOG_ARCHIVED FROM V$ARCHIVED_LOG WHERE DEST_ID = 1 AND ARCHIVED = 'YES'), (SELECT MAX (SEQUENCE#) LOG_APPLIED FROM V$ARCHIVED_LOG WHERE DEST_ID = 2 AND APPLIED = 'YES'), (SELECT TO_CHAR (MAX (COMPLETION_TIME), 'DD-MON/HH24:MI') APPLIED_TIME FROM V$ARCHIVED_LOG WHERE DEST_ID = 2 AND APPLIED = 'YES')
select * from gv$dataguard_status order by timestamp desc
select * from gv$dataguard_stats
select open_mode,database_role from v$database
select client_process,process,thread#,sequence#,status from gv$managed_standby where CLIENT_PROCESS='LGWR' OR PROCESS='MRP0' order by process
select * from gv$managed_standby order by process
select * from V$ARCHIVE_GAP

select 'Last Applied : ' Logs, to_char(next_time,'DD-MON-YY:HH24:MI:SS') Time,sequence# Sequence from v$archived_log where sequence# = (select max(sequence#) from v$archived_log where applied='YES') union select 'Last Received : ' Logs, to_char(next_time,'DD-MON-YY:HH24:MI:SS') Time,sequence# Sequence from v$archived_log where sequence# = (select max(sequence#) from v$archived_log)
SELECT * FROM V$STANDBY_EVENT_HISTOGRAM
select apply_name,status,queue_name,apply_captured from dba_apply

/*select * from (with t as (*/ select apply_name,server_id,state,apply_time,APPLIED_MESSAGE_CREATE_TIME,TOTAL_MESSAGES_APPLIED, round(APPLIED_MESSAGE_CREATE_TIME-APPLY_TIME,'2') lag from gv$streams_apply_server where apply_name=:APPLY_NAME
/*order by inst_id) select 'APPLY_NAME -> ', apply_name from t union all select 'STATE -> ', to_char(state) from t union all select 'APPLY_TIME -> ', to_char (APPLY_TIME,'dd.mm.yyyy hh24:mi:ss') from t union all select 'APPLIED_MESSAGE_CREATE_TIME -> ', to_char(APPLIED_MESSAGE_CREATE_TIME,'dd.mm.yyyy hh24:mi:ss') from t union all select 'APPLY LAG MINs-> ',to_char(round(APPLY_TIME-APPLIED_MESSAGE_CREATE_TIME,'2')*24*60) lag_min from t union all select 'TOTAL_MESSAGES_APPLIED -> ', to_char (TOTAL_MESSAGES_APPLIED) from t )*/

select to_date(to_char(BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME,'dd.mm.yyyy hh24:mi'),'dd.mm.yyyy hh24:mi') dt, case when messages<0 then 0 else messages end messages from ( select begin_interval_time,server_total_messages_applied-lead(server_total_messages_applied) over (order by begin_interval_time desc) messages from DBA_HIST_STREAMS_APPLY_SUM a,DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT c where a.snap_id=c.snap_id and apply_name= :APPLY_NAME and a.instance_number=c.instance_number and begin_interval_time>trunc(sysdate)-1 order by c.snap_id desc) order by begin_interval_time

select dt,messages-lead(messages) over (order by messages desc) from (select trunc(begin_interval_time,'dd')dt,apply_name,max(server_total_messages_applied) messages from DBA_HIST_STREAMS_APPLY_SUM a,DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT c where a.snap_id=c.snap_id and apply_name=:APPLY_NAME and a.instance_number=c.instance_number and begin_interval_time>sysdate-21 group by trunc(begin_interval_time,'dd'),apply_name) order by dt
select a.sid,a.* from gv$streams_apply_server a where a.apply_name=:APPLY_NAME --order by status desc

select APPLY_NAME APPLY, QUEUE_NAME, --QUEUE_OWNER, --LOCAL_TRANSACTION_ID LID, SOURCE_DATABASE, --SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID, --SOURCE_COMMIT_SCN, MESSAGE_NUMBER, ERROR_NUMBER, ERROR_CREATION_TIME, ERROR_MESSAGE, --RECIPIENT_ID,RECIPIENT_NAME, MESSAGE_COUNT --, --SOURCE_COMMIT_POSITION, --ERROR_TYPE from dba_apply_error a where APPLY_NAME = :APPLY_NAME order by ERROR_CREATION_TIME desc

select APPLY_NAME APPLY, QUEUE_NAME, --QUEUE_OWNER, --LOCAL_TRANSACTION_ID LID, SOURCE_DATABASE, --SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID, --SOURCE_COMMIT_SCN, MESSAGE_NUMBER, ERROR_NUMBER, ERROR_CREATION_TIME, ERROR_MESSAGE, --RECIPIENT_ID,RECIPIENT_NAME, MESSAGE_COUNT --, --SOURCE_COMMIT_POSITION, --ERROR_TYPE from dba_apply_error a order by ERROR_CREATION_TIME desc
select rownum,a.* from dba_streams_table_rules a
select * from DBA_QUEUE_TABLES where owner = 'STRMADMIN'
select * from dba_propagation
select * from DBA_APPLY_DML_HANDLERS
select * from ggadmin.exceptions

SELECT program,status,PROC,lag,lag_chk,dt_change, cnt err FROM GGADMIN.STATS_LAGS lag left join (select rep_name,count(*) cnt from ggadmin.exceptions group by rep_name) err on upper(err.rep_name)=upper(lag.proc) WHERE dt_change = (SELECT MAX(dt_change) FROM GGADMIN.STATS_LAGS ) order by lag desc,lag_chk desc,err desc
SELECT dt_change,proc,lag,lag_chk FROM GGADMIN.STATS_LAGS where dt_change>sysdate-2/24 and PROGRAM <> 'MANAGER' and proc=:PROC order by dt_change
select * from ggadmin.exceptions where upper(rep_name) = :PROC order by tran_date desc

SELECT PROC, sum_ops, ops_dif, sum_err, err_dif, dt_change, dt_dif, (ROUND(ops_dif/dt_dif, 2)) ops_per_sec, dt_start, r, SUM(ops_dif) over (partition BY r) total_ops_dif FROM (SELECT PROC, sum_ops, sum_prev_ops, sum_ops-sum_prev_ops ops_dif, sum_err, sum_err-sum_prev_err err_dif, dt_change, dt_prev, ROUND((dt_change-dt_prev)*24*60*60,2) dt_dif, dt_start, row_number() over (partition BY PROC, dt_start order by dt_change DESC) r FROM (SELECT PROC, sum_ops, lag(sum_ops) over (partition BY PROC, dt_start order by dt_change) sum_prev_ops , sum_err, lag(sum_err) over (partition BY PROC, dt_start order by dt_change) sum_prev_err, dt_change , lag(dt_change) over (partition BY PROC, dt_start order by dt_change) dt_prev, dt_start FROM (SELECT PROC, SUM(inserts +updates+deletes) sum_ops, SUM(ins_collisions+upd_collisions+del_collisions+discards) sum_err, dt_change, dt_start FROM GGADMIN.STATS_OPS a WHERE --schema='CRM_001' and dt_change > TRUNC(sysdate) AND dt_start= (SELECT MAX(dt_start) FROM GGADMIN.STATS_OPS i WHERE i.proc= a.proc ) GROUP BY PROC, dt_change, dt_start ) ) ) O WHERE R <= 30 ORDER BY r

SELECT PROC, schema, sum_ops, ops_dif, sum_err, err_dif, dt_change, dt_dif, (ROUND(ops_dif/dt_dif, 2)) ops_per_sec, dt_start, r, SUM(ops_dif) over (partition BY r) total_ops_dif FROM (SELECT PROC, schema, sum_ops, sum_prev_ops, sum_ops-sum_prev_ops ops_dif, sum_err, sum_err-sum_prev_err err_dif, dt_change, dt_prev, ROUND((dt_change-dt_prev)*24*60*60,2) dt_dif, dt_start, row_number() over (partition BY PROC, schema, dt_start order by dt_change DESC) r FROM (SELECT PROC, schema, sum_ops, lag(sum_ops) over (partition BY PROC, schema, dt_start order by dt_change) sum_prev_ops , sum_err, lag(sum_err) over (partition BY PROC, schema, dt_start order by dt_change) sum_prev_err, dt_change , lag(dt_change) over (partition BY PROC, schema, dt_start order by dt_change) dt_prev, dt_start FROM (SELECT PROC, schema, SUM(inserts +updates+deletes) sum_ops, SUM(ins_collisions+upd_collisions+del_collisions+discards) sum_err, dt_change, dt_start FROM GGADMIN.STATS_OPS a WHERE --schema='CRM_001' and dt_change > TRUNC(sysdate) AND dt_start= (SELECT MAX(dt_start) FROM GGADMIN.STATS_OPS i WHERE i.proc= a.proc ) GROUP BY PROC, schema, dt_change, dt_start ) ) ) O WHERE R <= 5 ORDER BY r, schema

SELECT * FROM (SELECT PROC, ROUND(dif_bytes_out/(dif_dt+1),2) bytes_per_sec, out_msg, dif_msg_out, ROUND(out_bytes/1024/1024,2) out_mb, dif_bytes_out, ROUND(uncomp_bytes/1024/1024,2) uncomp_mb, ROUND(comp_bytes /1024/1024,2) comp_mb, 100 -ROUND(comp_bytes/(uncomp_bytes+1)*100,2) ratio, dt_change, dif_dt, dt_start, row_number() over(partition BY PROC order by dt_change DESC) r FROM (SELECT PROC, out_msg, prev_msg_out, out_msg-prev_msg_out dif_msg_out, out_bytes, prev_out_bytes, out_bytes-prev_out_bytes dif_bytes_out, uncomp_bytes, prev_uncomp_bytes, comp_bytes, prev_comp_bytes, dt_change, prev_dt_change, (dt_change-prev_dt_change)*24*60*60 dif_dt, dt_start FROM (SELECT PROC, out_msg, lag(out_msg) over (partition BY PROC order by dt_change) prev_msg_out, out_bytes, lag(out_bytes) over (partition BY PROC order by dt_change) prev_out_bytes, uncomp_bytes, lag(uncomp_bytes) over (partition BY PROC order by dt_change) prev_uncomp_bytes, comp_bytes, lag(comp_bytes) over (partition BY PROC order by dt_change) prev_comp_bytes, dt_change, lag(dt_change) over (partition BY PROC order by dt_change) prev_dt_change, dt_start FROM GGADMIN.STATS_TCP o WHERE --proc = 'EXDP_CRM' and dt_change > TRUNC(sysdate) AND dt_start = (SELECT MAX(dt_start) FROM GGADMIN.STATS_TCP i WHERE i.proc=o.proc ) ) ) ) WHERE R <= 5 ORDER BY r, PROC

SELECT dt_change, schema, TABLE_NAME, SUM(INS_COLLISIONS)+ SUM(UPD_COLLISIONS)+ SUM(DEL_COLLISIONS) errs FROM GGADMIN.STATS_OPS having TABLE_NAME not like 'HEART%' and SUM(INS_COLLISIONS)+ SUM(UPD_COLLISIONS)+ SUM(DEL_COLLISIONS)>0 AND DT_CHANGE = (SELECT MAX(DT_CHANGE) FROM GGADMIN.STATS_OPS ) GROUP BY dt_change, schema, table_name ORDER BY 4 DESC

SELECT schema, TABLE_NAME, SUM(INS_COLLISIONS), SUM(UPD_COLLISIONS), SUM(DEL_COLLISIONS) from GGADMIN.STATS_OPS WHERE TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'HEART%' and schema=:SCHEMA and table_name=:TABLE_NAME group by schema,table_name
select apply_name,status,status_change_time,purpose from dba_apply

select to_date(to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'dd.mm.yyyy hh24:mi'),'dd.mm.yyyy hh24:mi') start_time, --to_date(to_char(s.end_interval_time,'dd.mm.yyyy hh24:mi'),'dd.mm.yyyy hh24:mi') end_time, --sa.apply_name, round(sa.reader_lag,5) reader_lag, --sa.reader_total_messages_dequeued, nvl(sa.reader_total_messages_dequeued-lag(sa.reader_total_messages_dequeued) over (order by s.end_interval_time),sa.reader_total_messages_dequeued) dequeued, round(sa.coord_lwm_lag,5) coord_lwm_lag, --sa.coord_total_received, nvl(sa.coord_total_received-lag(sa.coord_total_received) over (order by s.end_interval_time),sa.coord_total_received) trns_received, --sa.coord_total_applied, nvl(sa.coord_total_applied-lag(sa.coord_total_applied) over (order by s.end_interval_time),sa.coord_total_applied) trns_applied, --sa.coord_total_rollbacks, --sa.coord_total_wait_deps, --sa.coord_total_wait_cmts, --sa.server_total_messages_applied, nvl(sa.server_total_messages_applied-lag(sa.server_total_messages_applied) over (order by s.end_interval_time),sa.server_total_messages_applied) applied, --sa.server_elapsed_dequeue_time, --sa.server_elapsed_apply_time, nvl(sa.server_elapsed_apply_time-lag(sa.server_elapsed_apply_time) over (order by s.end_interval_time), sa.server_elapsed_apply_time/100) apply_time --, --sa.startup_time --,sa.instance_number, --sa.dbid from dba_hist_streams_apply_sum sa, dba_hist_snapshot s where sa.apply_name in (select apply_name from dba_apply where purpose like 'GoldenGate%') and sa.snap_id=s.snap_id and s.end_interval_time >= systimestamp-1 and sa.apply_name = :APPLY_NAME order by sa.apply_name,s.end_interval_time

select s.begin_interval_time,s.end_interval_time , sc.capture_name,sc.lag, sc.total_messages_captured,sc.total_messages_enqueued, sc.elapsed_pause_time, sc.elapsed_redo_wait_time, sc.elapsed_rule_time, sc.elapsed_enqueue_time, sc.startup_time,sc.instance_number,sc.dbid from dba_hist_streams_capture sc, dba_hist_snapshot s where sc.capture_name in (select capture_name from dba_capture where purpose like 'GoldenGate%') and sc.snap_id=s.snap_id and s.end_interval_time >= systimestamp-1 order by sc.capture_name,s.end_interval_time desc
select * from GV$GG_APPLY_COORDINATOR
select * from GV$GOLDENGATE_TABLE_STATS order by last_update desc
select owner,count(*),min(last_refresh) from dba_snapshots having min(last_refresh) < trunc(sysdate) group by owner order by min(last_refresh)
select rownum,a.* from dba_snapshots a where owner=:OWNER order by last_refresh
SELECT sname, oname, dblink, COUNT(*) FROM system.def$_aqcall JOIN system.repcat$_repprop USING ( recipient_key) GROUP BY recipient_key, sname, oname, dblink ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

item.title: Delete deffered trans
item.sql: begin for i in (select dblink from system.repcat$_repprop) loop DBMS_DEFER_SYS.DELETE_TRAN ( deferred_tran_id=>NULL, destination=>'i.DBLINK');end loop; end;

query.sql: select DEFERRED_TRAN_ID DTI, ORIGIN_TRAN_DB, ORIGIN_TRAN_ID, CALLNO, DESTINATION, START_TIME, ERROR_NUMBER, ERROR_MSG, RECEIVER from deferror
SELECT DT, SUM(QCMD_COUNT) CNT FROM log.REPL_STAT_REPORT_HIST where SNAME='GL' AND dt > sysdate-1 GROUP BY dt ORDER BY dt

select SID, START_TIME "STARTED",TOTALWORK "TOTAL BLOCKS", sofar "BLOCKS DONE", round((sofar/totalwork),4) * 100 "%", sysdate + TIME_REMAINING/3600/24 ETA from v$session_longops where totalwork > sofar AND opname NOT LIKE '%aggregate%' AND opname like 'RMAN%'

SELECT trunc(first_time) "Date", to_char(first_time, 'Dy') "Day", count(1) "Total", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'00',1,0)) "0", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'01',1,0)) "1", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'02',1,0)) "2", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'03',1,0)) "3", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'04',1,0)) "4", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'05',1,0)) "5", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'06',1,0)) "6", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'07',1,0)) "7", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'08',1,0)) "8", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'09',1,0)) "9", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'10',1,0)) "10", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'11',1,0)) "11", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'12',1,0)) "12", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'13',1,0)) "13", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'14',1,0)) "14", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'15',1,0)) "15", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'16',1,0)) "16", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'17',1,0)) "17", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'18',1,0)) "18", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'19',1,0)) "19", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'20',1,0)) "20", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'21',1,0)) "21", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'22',1,0)) "22", SUM(decode(to_char(first_time, 'hh24'),'23',1,0)) "23", round(count(1) / 24, 2) "Avg" FROM V$log_history group by trunc(first_time), to_char(first_time, 'Dy') Order by 1 desc
select * from GV$ARCHIVED_LOG order by first_time desc
Select * From V$LOG_HISTORY order by first_time desc
select destination,type,status, error, archived_seq#, applied_seq# from GV$ARCHIVE_DEST_STATUS where destination is not null
select a.*,round(a.space_used*100/a.space_limit) pct_used from V$RECOVERY_FILE_DEST a
select * from V$RECOVERY_AREA_USAGE
sELECT d.tablespace_name, b.time, b.status FROM dba_data_files d, v$backup b WHERE d.file_id = b.FILE# AND b.STATUS = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT SESSION_STAMP, SESSION_RECID, command_id "Backup Name", b.status as "Status", TO_CHAR(b.start_time, 'MON DD, YYYY HH12:MI:SS PM') as "Start Time", b.time_taken_display as "Time Taken", b.input_type as "Type", b.output_device_type as "Output Devices", b.input_bytes_display as "Input Size", b.input_bytes_per_sec_display as "Input Rate (Per Sec)", b.output_bytes_display as "Output Size", b.output_bytes_per_sec_display as "Output Rate (Per Sec)", round(b.compression_ratio) "Compression ratio" FROM V$RMAN_BACKUP_JOB_DETAILS b ORDER BY b.start_time DESC
select output from GV$RMAN_OUTPUT where session_stamp=:SESSION_STAMP and session_recid=:SESSION_RECID order by recid
select a.*,trunc(a.bytes/1024/1024/1024,2) gb from gv$sgainfo a order by gb desc
select * from GV$MEMORY_DYNAMIC_COMPONENTS order by component,inst_id
SELECT SUM(pga_alloc_mem)/1024/1024 AS "Mbytes allocated", SUM(pga_used_mem)/1024/1024 AS "Mbytes used" FROM v$process
select * from V$DB_CACHE_ADVICE
select * from V$JAVA_POOL_ADVICE
select * from V$MEMORY_TARGET_ADVICE
select * from V$MTTR_TARGET_ADVICE
select * from V$PGA_TARGET_ADVICE
select * from V$PGA_TARGET_ADVICE_HISTOGRAM
select * from V$PX_BUFFER_ADVICE
select * from V$SGA_TARGET_ADVICE
select * from GV$SHARED_POOL_ADVICE
select * from V$STREAMS_POOL_ADVICE

SELECT p.spid, p.pid, s.sid, s.serial#, s.status, p.pga_alloc_mem, p.pga_used_mem, s.username, s.osuser, s.program FROM v$process p, v$session s WHERE s.paddr( + ) = p.addr ORDER BY p.pga_alloc_mem DESC
select * from gv$inmemory_area
select * from gV$IM_SEGMENTS V
select * from V$PGASTAT

select s.owner owner, object_name objname, subobject_name subobjname, substr(object_type,1,10) objtype, ts.block_size / 1024 blockkb, buffer.blocks blocks, s.blocks totalblocks, (buffer.blocks * ts.block_size / 1024) memkb, (buffer.blocks/decode(s.blocks, 0, .001, s.blocks))*100 bufferpercent from (select o.owner, o.object_name, o.subobject_name, o.object_type object_type, count(*) blocks from dba_objects o, v$bh bh where o.object_id = bh.objd and o.owner not in ('SYS','SYSTEM') group by o.owner, o.object_name, o.subobject_name, o.object_type) buffer, dba_segments s, dba_tablespaces ts where s.tablespace_name = ts.tablespace_name and s.owner = buffer.owner and s.segment_name = buffer.object_name and s.SEGMENT_TYPE = buffer.object_type and (s.PARTITION_NAME = buffer.subobject_name or buffer.subobject_name is null) order by bufferpercent desc
SELECT * FROM dba_sql_plan_baselines a ORDER BY ENABLED DESC,ACCEPTED DESC
select t.TASK_NAME TASK, t.task_id TASK_ID, t.* from dba_advisor_tasks t where not regexp_like(task_name,'(ADDM)|(SYS)') order by created desc
select * from dba_advisor_RECOMMENDATIONS where task_id = :TASK_ID
select * from DBA_ADVISOR_ACTIONS where task_id = :TASK_ID
select DBMS_Sqltune.REPORT_TUNING_TASK(:TASK, 'TEXT', 'TYPICAL','ALL') from dual
select * from dba_sql_patches

select substr(extractvalue(value(d), '/hint'), 1, 512) as sql_patch_hints from xmltable('/outline_data/hint' passing (select xmltype(comp_data) as xmlval from sys.sqlobj$data od, sys.sqlobj$ o where od.obj_type = 3 -- and (o.name = 'SHORT_PARSE' and o.obj_type = 3) and o.signature = od.signature and comp_data is not null)) d
select s.sql_id SQLID, to_number(s.exact_matching_signature) SIG, s.* from v$sql s
select * from sys.sqlobj$ where to_number(signature) = :SIG

WITH sqlstat AS (SELECT --* COUNT( *) over (partition BY sql_id) cnt, ROUND(ELAPSED_TIME/greatest(EXECUTIONS,1)/1000000, 3) sec_per_exec, ROUND(CPU_TIME /greatest(EXECUTIONS,1)/1000000, 3) cpu_per_exec, ROUND(DISK_READS /greatest(EXECUTIONS,1)) rds_per_exec, PARSING_SCHEMA_NAME, SQL_ID, PLAN_HASH_VALUE, MODULE, ELAPSED_TIME, EXECUTIONS, LAST_ACTIVE_TIME, SQL_TEXT, CPU_TIME, DISK_READS, SQL_PROFILE, SQL_PATCH, SQL_PLAN_BASELINE, APPLICATION_WAIT_TIME, CONCURRENCY_WAIT_TIME, CLUSTER_WAIT_TIME, USER_IO_WAIT_TIME, PLSQL_EXEC_TIME, JAVA_EXEC_TIME, ROWS_PROCESSED, COMMAND_TYPE, OPTIMIZER_COST, HASH_VALUE, OLD_HASH_VALUE, IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES, PHYSICAL_READ_REQUESTS, PHYSICAL_READ_BYTES, PHYSICAL_WRITE_REQUESTS, PHYSICAL_WRITE_BYTES, LOCKED_TOTAL, --PINNED_TOTAL, FIRST_LOAD_TIME FROM v$sql WHERE LAST_ACTIVE_TIME > sysdate-1000/24/60 AND parsing_schema_name NOT IN ('GGADMIN','SYS','SYSTEM') --trunc(sysdate) ) SELECT * FROM sqlstat WHERE sql_id = :SQLID ORDER BY sql_id, sec_per_exec

WITH sqlstat AS (SELECT --* COUNT( *) over (partition BY sql_id) cnt, ROUND(ELAPSED_TIME/greatest(EXECUTIONS,1)/1000000, 3) sec_per_exec, ROUND(CPU_TIME /greatest(EXECUTIONS,1)/1000000, 3) cpu_per_exec, ROUND(DISK_READS /greatest(EXECUTIONS,1)) rds_per_exec, PARSING_SCHEMA_NAME, SQL_ID, PLAN_HASH_VALUE, MODULE, ELAPSED_TIME, EXECUTIONS, LAST_ACTIVE_TIME, SQL_TEXT, CPU_TIME, DISK_READS, SQL_PROFILE, SQL_PATCH, SQL_PLAN_BASELINE, APPLICATION_WAIT_TIME, CONCURRENCY_WAIT_TIME, CLUSTER_WAIT_TIME, USER_IO_WAIT_TIME, PLSQL_EXEC_TIME, JAVA_EXEC_TIME, ROWS_PROCESSED, COMMAND_TYPE, OPTIMIZER_COST, HASH_VALUE, OLD_HASH_VALUE, IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES, PHYSICAL_READ_REQUESTS, PHYSICAL_READ_BYTES, PHYSICAL_WRITE_REQUESTS, PHYSICAL_WRITE_BYTES, LOCKED_TOTAL, PINNED_TOTAL, FIRST_LOAD_TIME FROM v$sql WHERE LAST_ACTIVE_TIME > sysdate-1000/24/60 AND parsing_schema_name NOT IN ('GGADMIN','SYS','SYSTEM') --trunc(sysdate) ) SELECT * FROM sqlstat WHERE sql_id = :SQLID ORDER BY sql_id, sec_per_exec
select * from gv$database
select * from GV$INSTANCE
select inst_id,con_id,name,open_mode,restricted,open_time,total_size from gv$pdbs order by inst_id
select * from DBA_PDB_SAVED_STATES
select * from CDB_PDB_HISTORY
